analysis.key_quote: Do not reclassify these employees as Schedule F. 1 in 4 are already gone. Public health is a critical component of our society and millions will suffer with the gutting of this department, if not die.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the reclassification of employees into Schedule F, highlighting the potential negative impact on public health and implying that such a move would undermine the integrity and effectiveness of the civil service.
